attributes.action: urge Greenwich Council to stop the forthcoming performance of Ben Hur at the O2 stadium which intends to use numerous animals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The upcoming Ben Hur live show at the O2 Arena is being advertised as a spectacular event that will use "a hundred animals, as well as horses, camels, donkeys, chickens, falcons, and eagles".
   Aside from the fact that animals should not be exploited in this way.  We believe that an event such as this cannot possibly guarantee the safety and wellbeing of so many animals.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
